snippet: Iran is suspicious of Azerbaijan’s ties with Israel and the West, and Azerbaijan has long chafed at Iran’s support of Armenia, its sworn enemy.
abstract: Tensions between Azerbaijan and Iran mount as Iran expresses deep unease over its neighbor's expanding military cooperation with Israel; vital border crossings between the two countries have been shut and officials in both countries are involved in an escalating media war.
lead_paragraph: Iran is suspicious of Azerbaijan’s ties with Israel and the West, and Azerbaijan has long chafed at Iran’s support of Armenia, its sworn enemy.

headline.seo: Iran and Azerbaijan, Wary Neighbors, Find Less to Agree On
headline.main: Iran and Azerbaijan, Already Wary Neighbors, Find Even Less to Agree On
headline.print_headline: Iran and Azerbaijan, Already Wary Neighbors, Find Even Less to Agree On
